name: Federation of Screenwriters in Europe
goal: The Federation of Screenwriters in Europe (FSE) is the voice of screenwriters at European level and at the European institutions. It brings together 26 screenwriters’ organisations (national and regional associations, guilds and unions of writers for the screen) from 21 European countries. It represents more than 7,000 professional screenwriters.
interests: Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Single market
euInitiatives:
Strengthening Guilds
Visibility of Screenwriters
Remuneration
Copyright
Collective bargaining
New European Legislation
Gender Issues
